task.title: Fix broker UUID-suffix registration in Relaycast

events.content: Prefer cached relaycast token for strict broker identity: Prefer cached relaycast token for strict broker identity

raw.question: Prefer cached relaycast token for strict broker identity
raw.chosen: Prefer cached relaycast token for strict broker identity
raw.reasoning: Avoids unnecessary re-registration and prevents UUID-suffixed agent_name when name conflict occurs.

retrospective.summary: Enforced strict broker names and added cached-token reuse for broker init and strict-name 409 conflicts; validated with cargo test and cargo build.
